response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds a significant value of $1,200,000 to you, and I believe it would greatly enhance your endeavors or personal pursuits. Considering its unique features and the benefits it offers, I am extending an offer to purchase this product at a special price of $1,400,000. I am confident that this offer presents an attractive balance between the value you seek and the cost involved. Should you decide to accept this proposal, I assure you a seamless transaction process. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1400000}
